decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay using a combination of powerful creatures and efficient spells to put pressure on the opponent. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Leyline Binding and Leyline of the Guildpact while dealing direct damage with Lightning Bolt and other spells. The deck also includes strong creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to quickly end the game. The inclusion of Stubborn Denial and Consign to Memory adds versatility and disruption to the deck's strategy. Overall, this deck is designed to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive approach.

This deck aims to control the game through a combination of powerful Eldrazi creatures, Karn's artifact abilities, and the Tron lands. It uses cards like Devourer of Destiny and Sire of Seven Deaths to dominate the battlefield, while disrupting opponents with cards like Relic of Progenitus and Thought-Knot Seer. The deck also utilizes Ugin, the Spirit Dragon and All Is Dust to clear the board when needed. With access to powerful Eldrazi creatures and the ability to disrupt opponents' strategies, this deck aims to lockdown and control the game until victory is achieved.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy while applying pressure with aggressive creatures. By using cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Force of Negation to counter spells, Fatal Push to remove threats, and Ephemerate to protect key creatures, the deck can control the game while chipping away at the opponent's life total. The creatures in the deck, such as Emperor of Bones and Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd, provide a clock for the opponent to deal with, forcing them to react quickly or be overwhelmed. The deck also includes card advantage engines like Consign to Memory and Hydroelectric Specimen to ensure it maintains resources throughout the game.

This UW Control deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage provided by Narset, Parter of Veils. The deck utilizes various spells like Orim's Chant and Supreme Verdict to disrupt opponents' strategies and maintain board control. Teferi, Time Raveler gives the deck versatility and protection, while Isochron Scepter allows for repeated use of key spells. The inclusion of Kaheera, the Orphanguard as a companion adds additional utility and synergizes well with the creature-heavy control strategy. Overall, the deck aims to outlast opponents and win through attrition.

The deck focuses on ramping up quickly using cards like Arboreal Grazer and Amulet of Vigor, while utilizing lands like Vesuva and Lotus Field to generate extra mana. The goal is to quickly assemble the combo of Amulet Titan and Primeval Titan to search for key lands like Gruul Turf and Boseiju, Who Endures. With access to powerful spells like Scapeshift and Green Sun's Zenith, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with explosive plays and quickly overpower them through land synergies and powerful creature threats.

The main concept of this deck is to create a fast and aggressive strategy using creatures that disrupt the opponent's plans (Death and Taxes archetype). By utilizing powerful creatures like Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Witch Enchanter alongside support cards like Solitude and Starfield Shepherd, the deck aims to apply pressure early on and control the board. Cards like Ephemerate and Thraben Charm provide versatility and disruption, allowing the player to maintain tempo and outmaneuver their opponent. Overall, the deck focuses on quickly establishing a dominant board presence and disrupting the opponent's game plan.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy while applying pressure with aggressive creatures. It utilizes cards like Thoughtseize and Teferi, Time Raveler to control the game, while creatures like Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Flickerwisp provide a quick clock for the opponent. The deck also has a toolbox aspect with cards like Solitude and Ephemerate to deal with threats efficiently. By combining disruption and aggression, the deck aims to outpace the opponent and secure a victory through a combination of tempo advantage and combat damage.

The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler, while using Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart to remove any threats from the opponent. With a low curve and efficient spells, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently to win the game before the opponent can stabilize. The deck also includes card draw and manipulation to ensure consistent aggression and pressure.

The deck focuses on aggressive gameplay by quickly deploying powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Scion of Draco, supported by removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Tribal Flames. Leyline Binding and Arena of Glory help control the board, while Leyline of the Guildpact boosts the deck's synergy. The mana base is carefully crafted to ensure consistent access to all colors of mana needed for the diverse spells in the deck. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of speed, power, and versatility.

The deck revolves around utilizing powerful instant spells and reanimation effects to cheat big creatures like Griselbrand into play quickly. By disrupting the opponent's hand with cards like Thoughtseize and controlling the board with removal spells such as Solitude and Prismatic Ending, the deck aims to set up a powerful reanimation combo using cards like Goryo's Vengeance. Additionally, the deck benefits from cards like Ephemerate and Faithful Mending to help cycle through the deck and set up key plays. Overall, the strategy focuses on explosive plays and disrupting the opponent's game plan.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly using cards like Amulet of Vigor and Arboreal Grazer to cheat out huge threats like Primeval Titan and Titan lands like Urza's Saga. It also utilizes cards like Scapeshift and Lotus Field to generate massive amounts of mana and search for combo pieces to overwhelm the opponent. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and win the game through overwhelming board presence and powerful combo interactions.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly and efficiently mill the opponent's deck using cards such as Archive Trap, Fractured Sanity, Hedron Crab, and Ruin Crab. The deck also includes disruption elements like Drown in the Loch and Fatal Push to control the board and protect the milling strategy. With cards like Surgical Extraction and Field of Ruin, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while steadily depleting their library. The deck is designed to be consistent and aggressive in its mill strategy while maintaining control over the game.

This deck focuses on quickly reanimating powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Atraxa while disrupting the opponent with cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Negation. Using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Ephemerate, the deck can pull off explosive combos and control the board with instant-speed removal like Solitude and Prismatic Ending. By utilizing a mix of graveyard recursion and disruptive spells, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and quickly close out the game.

The focus of this deck is to ramp up mana quickly using cards like Utopia Sprawl and Talisman of Impulse, in order to cast high-cost Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. The deck also includes control elements with cards like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The Eldrazi Temple and Sanctum of Ugin help to tutor for and cast Eldrazi creatures more efficiently. Overall, the deck aims to control the board while ramping into powerful Eldrazi threats to overwhelm the opponent.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly developing a board presence and overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The key strategy is to continuously apply pressure on the opponent while maintaining control of the board with efficient removal spells and disruptive elements like Blood Moon. The deck is designed to be fast-paced and proactive, aiming to win the game before the opponent can stabilize. Ajani, Ragavan, and Phlage are key threats that can quickly close out the game if left unchecked, while cards like Goblin Bombardment and Guide of Souls provide additional reach and flexibility in combat.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and spells like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to apply quick pressure on the opponent. It also includes cards like Goblin Bombardment and Galvanic Discharge for additional reach and removal. The deck has a strong Boros mana base with cards like Sacred Foundry and Arid Mesa to ensure consistency in casting its spells. In addition, the deck includes cards like Ranger-Captain of Eos and Ocelot Pride to generate card advantage and maintain board presence. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its efficient creatures and spells while disrupting their game plan with cards like Static Prison and Thraben Charm.
